author: Abc South West Wa
title: Police urge family of man injured in fatal Capel crash to contact Facebook over post - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
text:
Map: Capel 6271 
Western Australian police are liaising with the family of the alleged driver of a car involved in last weekend's fatal accident in Capel over "issues" related to the man's Facebook page. 
Shaun Southern, a 45-year-old father of two, remains in hospital in Bunbury after being thrown from a vehicle that crashed on the Bussell Highway just south of Bunbury on Saturday. 
The driver of another vehicle involved, 61-year-old Jenni Pratt, died at the scene, while her 54-year-old passenger also remains in hospital in Bunbury with serious injuries. 
Disturbing footage of the accident, which showed a vehicle driving erratically into oncoming traffic, was widely circulated on social media and news bulletins. 
It showed the vehicle crossing lanes, nearly colliding with multiple vehicles before colliding with the car being driven by Ms Pratt. Facebook page inundated with comments 
A post dated January 31 on Mr Southern's Facebook page has since been inundated with negative and obscene comments, and police say they are aware of the issues. 
"Police â€¦ have been liaising with the man's family," a police media spokesperson told the ABC. 
"As a result, the family are making inquiries directly with Facebook. There is nothing further we can add on the investigation. Inquiries are ongoing." 
When contacted by the ABC, Facebook replied with a series of automated responses, one of which related to the removal of "someone who has been medically incapacitated". 
"We can temporarily deactivate the account if you provide documentation verifying you're the account holder's legal guardian or their executor," the reply stated. 
"We'll need documentation verifying you're the account holder's legal guardian or executor, and medical documentation outlining their medical condition. 
"If you haven't already done so, please attach the necessary documents in a response to this email."
